channel.title: Rune Age
channel.description:
[center]Rune Age[/center]
[b]Goal:[/b] My goal is to create a very stable 317 server from both an economical and technical standpoint. I'd like Rune Age to be similar to Runescape's past, the times where people fantasized over PKing a whip or rune armor. The Rune Age team will mainly focus on combat related skills, the economy, and some non-combat skills for those who enjoy kicking back and doing something irrelevant to fighting.
[u]The positions I need filled.[/u]
- Source Coder (1-2)
- Client Coder (1)
- Funder / Hoster (1-2)
[b]Information about mysef:[/b] In all honesty, I'm not a very good coder. I know how to work my way around the files and change small scale things, but I'm more of a website developer, and that's why I'll mainly be focused on during this project. I have an Invision Power Board license, which will be used to create our forums. Whether it be 2.3.6 (earliest stable version, and personally my favorite) or 3.0.5, we will have an organized, sleek and advanced looking forum to add to our professional feel.
[u]Application[/u] [code]Name: Contact Information (MSN/Email/Other): Position: Why should I choose you?: [/code]

item.title: Rune Age
item.dc:creator: @M00_M00_Pk M00 M00 Pk
item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

I could help out by making images for you, a website and a forum… pretty basic stuff but i can do it.

EDIT: http://moostestforum.co.nr/ That is one of my forums; i made it to show people what i can do.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Age
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Amayzing, post:1, topic:331533”][center]Rune Age[/center]

  • Funder / Hoster (1-2)
    [[/quote]
    If you cant host you are not a owner of a server/development team, You are just trying to rip people off.
    Why “Funder”? They might aswell make theyre own server.

You should work on what i stated to make your post abit more understandable. Anyways good luck

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Age
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Well there’s a few problem here,

  1. Whats the base? why would someone just jump on a dev. when they don’t even know what base is being used?

  2. What are the other types of “work” being placed on the server other then Combat related stuff, like “Are you going to work on stability and a good integration setup?” or “Are you going to just get a delta source and play around with that until the dev. fails?”

  3. What do you mean by “Funder”?

  4. Are you just going to take there money and say “oh your owner” and buy a Dedi, web host, licenses, or are you going to also put money in?

Sounds ok so far though, good luck.

Read full topic
